{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for Personnel Transfer by Transfer Basket","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Slip and Fall / Injuries","existingMeasures":"1. Proper PPE Must be Worn by all Being Transferred by Basket.
2.The Work area should be properly maintained. All Debris, Objects and slippery material should be removed.
3.Landing areas to be Identified.
4. Persons being Transferred to be briefed.
5. If necessary a responsible officer to be present to supervise the transfer at all times.
6. Area to be well illuminated during dark hours.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Basket falls down","existingMeasures":"1. PMS of crane and lifting appliances.
2. Confirm from workboat, basket inspected and in good condition.
3. Ensure crane hook safety latch is working and in closed position.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Contact with stationary objects (railings, bulwarks, etc.)","existingMeasures":"1. Proper Identification of starting and landing areas.
2. Proper communication.
3. Weather conditions to be observed at all times, transfer to be abandoned if weather conditions become unsafe.
4. If necessary tug boat to be moored to the vessel.
5. Guide lines to be used for control of basket movement.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Weather Condition","existingMeasures":"1. Job to be aborted if vessel movement due to rolling/pitching make it unsafe.
2. Jobs not to be carried out in adverse weather.
3. Duty officer to observe and inform any sudden weather changes.
4. Weather forecast to be obtained.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
